hiSection.title: Hello, I'm Ayelén.
hiSection.subtitle: Welcome to my portfolio, where each line of code represents a new learning on my path.

aboutSection.title: About me
aboutSection.paragraph: Hi again, I'm Ayelén and I'm civil engineer, but some time ago I decided to redirect my career towards web development. I've always been interested in technology and problem-solving, and I found in programming a way to combine creativity and logic to build solutions. Currently, I am developing my portfolio to showcase my skills and projects. My goals is to continue learning and growing in the world of web development, contributing analytical and problem-solving skills acquired in my training as a engineer.

contactSection.title: Contact
contactSection.subtitle: You can find me in social media or send me an email.
